shadow.name: CONSTRICTION
shadow.description: Survival fear that contracts the spirit, defensive protection
shadow.somatic_signature: Tight chest, shallow breath, Fight-flight activation
shadow.thought_pattern: The world is dangerous. I must stay guarded.

gift.name: ACCEPTANCE
gift.description: Allowing life to unfold without resistance or control
gift.somatic_signature: Open heart, relaxed body, deep breathing
gift.thought_pattern: What is, is. I can handle what comes.

siddhi.name: LOVE
siddhi.description: Unconditional embrace of all experience, no preference
siddhi.emotional_state: Pure devotion, sacred yes to existence

inversion_protocols.script: Your anxiety is not intuitionâ€”it is your nervous system's habitual contraction. The G center's gift is acceptance, which does not mean passivity. It means meeting life without pre-defense. You are safe enough to lower the guard. Not because nothing bad will happen, but because you can handle whatever comes.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Place both hands on heart. Count 5 deep breaths. Feel your body's actual safety in this exact moment.

experiment.hypothesis: If I practice somatic regulation for 7 days, the baseline anxiety will decrease.
experiment.action: 3x daily: 5-minute body scan. Notice actual threat vs imagined. Ground in present safety.
